Title: A Rage in Harlem
Writer: Chester Himes (novel), John Toles-Bey (screenplay), Bobby Crawford (screenplay)
Actors: Forest Whitaker, Gregory Hines, Robin Givens, Zakes Mokae
Plot: A beautiful black gangster's moll flees to Harlem with a trunkload of gold after a shootout, unaware that the rest of the gang, and a few other unsavoury characters, are on her trail. A pudgy momma's boy becomes the object of her affections and the unlikely hero of the tale.
